sentence.Network_en: Recent medical studies confirm the efficacy of a healthier lifestyle.
sentence.Network_cn: 最新医学研究证实了较为健康的生活方式的好处。

sentence.Network_en: This plan would have some efficacy in preventing any danger.
sentence.Network_cn: 这计划对于防止危险会有些效力.

sentence.Network_en: The treatment has no efficacy in that disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种疗法对那种疾病不管事.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... sacrifice v 牺牲 efficacy n 功效，功能 efficacious a 有效应的.
法律效力（efficacy）的意思是“法律规范是有约束力的，人们应当像法律规范所规定的那样行为，应当服从和适用法律规范”{4}(P. 42)。
因应的效能（efficacy）是取决于个人的差異、所受威胁的類型、此压力遭遇所处的阶段以及欲讨論的压力后果之形式。上述所谈到的…
Efficacy of great spot low energy Q switch Nd ∶ YAG laser on melasma... 目的探讨大光斑低能量调Q开关Nd:YAG 1064 nm激光治疗黄褐斑的疗效和安全性.

list.abs: 发光效率 (Luminous efficacy, η) 单位：流明每瓦[lm/W]光谱 (Spectrum)光线依波长大小顺序之分布称为光谱。
光视效能（Luminous efficacy）η流明每瓦特lm/W光通量与辐射通量的比值，最大为683.002。发光效率（luminous efficiency）V纯数 …
政治效能感(political efficacy)指的是公众对于自己是否能够影响到政治活动的能力的信念或者信心。公众政治效能感的高低是体现一个.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 -... ... causal connection 因果联系 causal efficacy 因果功效 causal explanation 因果性解释.
光电词汇港... ... Luminous density 发光密度 Luminous efficacy 照明效率 luminous efficacy of radiant flux 视见函数，光见度.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin efficacia, from efficax, efficac- (see efficacious)

entry.def: If you talk about the efficacy of something, you are talking about its effectiveness and its ability to do what it is supposed to.

example.ex: Recent medical studies confirm the efficacy of a healthier lifestyle.
example.tran: 最新医学研究证实了较为健康的生活方式的好处。

means.word_mean: 1. capacity or power to produce a desired effect;

sentences.sentence: "concern about the safety and efficacy of the vaccine"

auth_sentence.content: It must remain dry it loses efficacy when wet.
auth_sentence.res_content: It must remain dry it loses efficacy when wet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It must remain dry it loses efficacy when wet.

auth_sentence.content: There are limits to the efficacy of federal government.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are limits to the efficacy of federal government.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are limits to the efficacy of federal government.

auth_sentence.content: The destruction of antibiotic efficacy should be welcome.
auth_sentence.res_content: The destruction of antibiotic efficacy should be welcome.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The destruction of antibiotic efficacy should be welcome.

stems_affixes.word_buile: super在……上面+fic做+ial……的→在表面上做
efficacy[[n.功效,效能,效力]]男→adj.有效的, 灵验的
ef出+fic做,制作+acy状态,结果→做出来的结果→功效
fict=fic做,制作+ion表名词→做出的故事
pro很多+fit=fic做→做很多,做得好→利润

sentences.en: The most commonly cited reasons for stopping the treatment were lack of efficacy and side effects.
sentences.cn: 最常举出的停止这种治疗的理由是无效和副作用。
